name: ChromaMystica
description:
Fine tune https://civitai.com/models/13565/criarcys-fantasy-to-experience with conceptmod https://github.com/ntc-ai/conceptmod

This technique does not require a dataset.

Training prompt: "=vivid and colorful|black and white=vibrant color|enchanting and mystical++"


This model responds to 'black and white' with 'vibrant color'.
This model moves the unconditional to 'vivid and colorful'
This model increases occurrence of 'enchanting and mystical' concepts

Trained in 2000 steps (about 6 hr on 2 a6000s)

This model is nsfw because the base model is nsfw.

meta.prompt: superhero masculine male wizard, waist up eyes peering directly into camera, captivating, vibrant, piercing, attention grabbing
meta.negativePrompt: blurry, anime, cartoon, drawing, fog, blur

meta.prompt: vivid and colorful, vibrant color, enchanting and mystical, best quality, masterpiece, cinematic, realistic, cyberpunk, cyberpunk city, neon, volumetric lighting, black sky, (raining, thunderstorm), 1girl, (cyberpunk clothing, hoodie, pants, punk clothes), (flowing red hair), water reflecting off ground, from behind, ((hidden face)),
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad_prompt_version2:0.8), (monochrome:1.1), (lowres:1.1), (loli:1.2), (child:1.2), (teenage:1.2), (aged down:1.2), blurry, censored, (worst quality, low quality:1.2), username, watermark, signature, text, (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad_prompt_version2:0.8), (monochrome:1.1), (lowres:1.1), (loli:1.2), (child:1.2), (teenage:1.2), (aged down:1.2),disfigured, missing limbs, extra limbs, extra legs, extra arms, blurred, missing fingers, discolored nipples, skintight, fat, obese, sfw, censored, (((bodysuit))), ,missing fingers, amputee, bodybuilder, muscular, child face, young face, (grayscale), (monochrome:1.3)

meta.prompt: enchanted mystical village in a forest, well lit, colorful
meta.negativePrompt: blurry, anime, cartoon, drawing, fog, blur

meta.prompt: fierce 1guy warlock casts a spell, vibrant, vivid and colorful, in library, headshot
enchanted mystical village in a forest, well lit, colorful
meta.negativePrompt: blurry, anime, cartoon, drawing, fog, blur

meta.prompt: Ancient demon mage casts a spell, vibrant, vivid and colorful, in library, headshot
